paper_title.ja: Theoretical Study for the Site Exchange Mechanism of Anionic 5-Coordinate Pt(Ⅱ) Complexes with Halide, [PtX(hfac)<sub>2</sub>]<sup>-</sup>
paper_title.en: Theoretical Study for the Site Exchange Mechanism of Anionic 5-Coordinate Pt(II) Complexes with Halide, [PtX(hfac)_2]^- (X=Cl, Br, I, hfac=hexafluoroacetylacetonate)

description.ja: 5配位錯アニオン、 [PtX(hfac)<SUB>2</SUB>]<SUP>-</SUP> (X = Cl, Br, I, hfac = hexafluoroacetylacetonate)の、溶液中における分子内配位サイト交換に関するab initio計算を行なった。まず5配位構造の最適化を、考えられる３つの構造について行なったところ、X線結晶解析されている四角錐型構造が最も安定で、計算値は構造データをよく再現することがわかった(Tables 1, 2)。次に分子内配位サイト交換運動(Scheme 1)で考えられる３つの経路の各三角両錐型遷移状体のエネルギーを計算した。このうち、頂点位置のO-ドナーがXに対してシスあるいはトランス位のO-ドナーを置換するPath AとBとが実際に起こると予想され、Path Aの速度は、Cl > Br > I、Path Bの速度は、I > Br > Clとなり、温度変化NMRスペクトルの結果から予測された順に一致した(Table 3)。前者はハライド配位子のシス効果、後者はトランス効果の順を表すものであり、シス効果の順がトランス効果のそれと逆であることは大変興味深い。
description.en: DFT calculations of the intra molecular site exchange process in square pyramidal five coordinate complexes, [PtX(hfac)2]- (hfac = 1, 1, 1, 5, 5, 5-hexafluoro-2, 4-pentanedionate, X = Cl, Br, I), were performed. The calculation reproduces well the X-ray molecular structures and the trigonal bipyramidal transition state energies of three possible paths, two of which actually seem to function, show that the order of the trans effect of halide ligands is Cl < Br < I, and that of the cis effect is Cl > Br > I, which is in accordance with the experimental results.

paper_title.ja: ハライドを持つ5配位錯アニオン, [PtX(hfac)_2]^-(X=Cl, Br, I, hfac=ヘキサフルオロアセチルアセトネート)のサイト交換機構についての理論的研究
paper_title.en: Theoretical Study for the Site Exchange Mechanism of Anionic 5-Coordinate Pt(Ⅱ) Complexes with Halide, [PtX(hfac)<sub>2</sub>]<sup>-</sup>

description.ja: 5配位錯アニオン、 [PtX(hfac)<SUB>2</SUB>]<SUP>-</SUP> (X = Cl, Br, I, hfac = hexafluoroacetylacetonate)の、溶液中における分子内配位サイト交換に関するab initio計算を行なった。まず5配位構造の最適化を、考えられる３つの構造について行なったところ、X線結晶解析されている四角錐型構造が最も安定で、計算値は構造データをよく再現することがわかった(Tables 1, 2)。次に分子内配位サイト交換運動(Scheme 1)で考えられる３つの経路の各三角両錐型遷移状体のエネルギーを計算した。このうち、頂点位置のO-ドナーがXに対してシスあるいはトランス位のO-ドナーを置換するPath AとBとが実際に起こると予想され、Path Aの速度は、Cl > Br > I、Path Bの速度は、I > Br > Clとなり、温度変化NMRスペクトルの結果から予測された順に一致した(Table 3)。前者はハライド配位子のシス効果、後者はトランス効果の順を表すものであり、シス効果の順がトランス効果のそれと逆であることは大変興味深い。
description.en: DFT calculations of the intra molecular site exchange process in square pyramidal five coordinate complexes, [PtX(hfac)2]- (hfac = 1, 1, 1, 5, 5, 5-hexafluoro-2, 4-pentanedionate, X = Cl, Br, I), were performed. The calculation reproduces well the X-ray molecular structures and the trigonal bipyramidal transition state energies of three possible paths, two of which actually seem to function, show that the order of the trans effect of halide ligands is Cl < Br < I, and that of the cis effect is Cl > Br > I, which is in accordance with the experimental results.

paper_title.en: Facile formation and dissociation behaviour of C-C bond resulted from the nucleophilic attack of carbanions on a carbonyl carbon in [Pt(hfac)(2)]

description.en: [Pt(hfac)(2)] (hfac: hexafluoroacetylacetonate) reacts with MeNH2 in CH2Cl2/MeOH to give an -NHMe adduct complex on one of the carbonyl carbons, (MeNH3) [Pt(hfac)(hfac-NHMe)] 1 which is a tetrahedral intermediate of a Schiff base complex, [Pt(CF3COCHC(NMe)CF3)(2)] 2. Complex 1 activates H2O, MeOH, MeNO2 or acetone in solution to form the corresponding conjugate base adducts. The C-C bond in -CH2NO2 adduct 6, easily cleaves and generates nitromethane in solution.

paper_title.en: Synteses, Structures and Solution Dynamics of Anionic 5-Coordinate Pt((]G0002[)) Complexes with Halide
Dinuclear platinum((]G0002[)) complex bridged by an acetylacetonate (3-) anion
Synthesis of a new Pd(II) complex with one hfac-O, O' and one hfac-monoxime-C, N as ligands; unexpected C-O bond formation between C3-bonded hfac and N-bonded monoxime

description.en: Reaction of [Pd(hfac)2] with monoximes gave new Pd complexes with one hfac-O, O'-chelate and one hfac-oxime-C, N-chelate, [Pd(hfac){N(=CRR')OC(OH)(CF3)CHCOCF3}], in which a C-O bond was formed between the C3-bonded hfac and the N-bonded monoxime.

paper_title.en: C=S BOND FISSION IN COORDINATED THIOUREAS AND FORMATION OF A SULFIDE-BRIDGED DINUCLEAR PD(II) COMPLEX

description.en: A reaction of [Pd(tol(2)TU(-1)-N,S)(2)] (tol(2)TU=1,3-di(o-tolyl)-thiourea) with dppm affords [Pd(tol(2)TU(-2)-N,S)(to(2)TU-S)(dppm-P)](1). Complex 1 is gradually converted into [Pd-2(mu-S)(mu-dppm)(2)(tol(2)TU(-1)-S)(2)] (2), with a sulfide bridge via CS bond activation in tol(2)TU. X-ray diffraction study shows that complex 2 has an A-frame dinuclear Pd(II) structure without a Pd-Pd.

paper_title.en: Di-, Tri- and Tetra-nuclear Palladium(Ⅱ) Complexes with Ureido Bridging Groups

C,N-CHELATED (2-PYRIDYLMETHYL)RHODIUM(III) COMPLEXES AND A NOVEL DINUCLEAR RHODIUM(III) COMPLEX CONTAINING A 2,6-DIMETHYLPYRIDINE-ALPHA,ALPHA'-DIYL GROUP AS AN ETA(2)(C,N)ETA(3)(C,C',N)-BRIDGING LIGAND

description.en: Oxidative-addition reactions of excess 2-(chloromethyl) and 2,6-bis(chloromethyl)pyridines with [RhCl-(PPh(3))(3)] in toluene at room temperature afforded (2-pyridylmethyl)- and (2-(6-chloromethyl)pyridylmethyl)rhodium(III) complexes, cis(PP)-[RhCl2(C5H3(6-R)N-2-CH2)(PPh(3))(2)] (R=H, 1-cis; R=CH2Cl, 2-cis), respectively, which isomerized to the corresponding trans(PP) complexes at elevated temperature. In refluxing toluene, the reactions thus resulted in the trans(PP) complexes (R=H, 1-trans; R=CH2Cl, 2-trans) exclusively. A novel dinuclear rhodium(III) complex [Rh2Cl4(C5H3N-2,6-(CH2)(2))(PPh(3))(2)], in which the 2,6-dimethylpyridine-alpha,alpha'-diyl ligand is C,N-chelated to one rhodium atom and bound to the second one in an eta(3)-pseudo-1-azaallylic fashion, was obtained by reactions of 2,6-bis(chloromethyl) pyridine with [RhCl(PPh(3))(3)] (1:2 in mole) and of the 2-cis with [RhCl(PPh(3))(3)] (1:1 in mole), both in refluxing toluene. These were characterized by H-1, C-13, and P-31 NMR spectroscopy and mass spectrometry as well as an elemental analysis and a molecular-weight determination.

publication_name.en: BULLETIN OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY OF JAPAN

paper_title.en: FACILE P-C BOND-CLEAVAGE IN BIS(DIPHENYLPHOSPHINO)METHANE WITH THE FORMATION OF NEW PT(II) P, S-CHELATES CONTAINING A P-N BOND

description.en: New platinum(II) P, S-chelates, [(dppm-H)PtP(Ph)2N(R)C(=NR)S] (R=o-tolyl or Et(2b)), were prepared by a reaction of [Pt(dppm-H)2] with 1,3-disubstituted thioureas. A reaction intermediate, [(dppm)PtN(R)C(=NR)S] (R=o-tol), was isolated. Crystallographic X-ray analysis for 2b revealed a P, S-chelated structure containing a P-N bond.
